text: visvasavantayini! oba allahvada, ohuge dutayavada, ohu tamange (mema) dutaya kerehi pahala kala mema dharmayada, meyata pera ohu pahala kala dharmayanda visvasa karanu. kavurun allahvada, ohuge malayikavarunvada, ohuge dharmayanda, ohuge dutayinvada, avasana dinayada, pratiksepa karanneda, ohu niyata vasayenma itamat Ã¦t vu durmargayehima gaman karanneya
